description: Reference® 2 Single-Channel Fixed Pipette, 2 mL, Eppendorf is an improved fixed pipette with extraordinary precision and accuracy, a long service lifes and an ergonomic design. The new Reference 2 is an ideal instrument for liquid handling due to its properties of that innovative single button, sturdy handle manufactured with stainless steel, 4-digit volume display with magnifying window, secondary adjustment, etc.
name: Reference 2 Single-Channel Fixed Pipette
